hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT COUNT(bs.pk_BOOKSITE_ID) as numcount,lv.activityLevel_NAME lvname FROM t_booksite_booksite bs,t_booksite_activitylevel lv WHERE bs.FK_ACTIVITYLEVEL_NO=lv.PK_activityLevel_ID and (bookSite_uploadDateTime between :start and :end) GROUP BY bs.FK_ACTIVITYLEVEL_NO

SELECT COUNT(bs.pk_BOOKSITE_ID) as numcount,lv.activityLevel_NAME lvname FROM t_booksite_booksite bs,t_booksite_activitylevel lv WHERE bs.FK_ACTIVITYLEVEL_NO=lv.PK_activityLevel_ID and (bookSite_uploadDateTime between :start and :end) GROUP BY bs.FK_ACTIVITYLEVEL_NO
